comments: Professor Duffy gives pretty good lectures, that are easy to follow, and will happily answer and questions you may have if you can\'t seem to follow along. She makes you work for your grade, but gives you some tools along the way to help you out. Overall this class was pretty good, and I would take her again :)

stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  RESPECTED  GET READY TO READ
comments: Dr. Duffy was an amazing teacher. Very enthusiastic about history and worked with students when they needed help or had questions. Make sure you do source notes from the textbook you will have a mini quiz each week on chapter sources and two exams(midterm/final) and she has extra credit every once in a while which can be very helpful.

comments: This professor is so dedicated to teaching History, and enthusiastic that it made it a very fun experience for me. There is a TON of reading/note taking/quizzes/Etc, and she grades hard but she is FAIR. Every grade Ive gotten whether good or bad I am told why. Total sleeper, had no idea how fun this class would be. Shes tough but with good intent

comments: She is a really good professor. She makes you want to learn. She gives you a quiz every week based of the reading. She gives you a midterm which is 3 paragraphs ( legit easy).. if you go to class and do the reading you will pass. Doing that will give you atleast a B

comments: Always didnt care for history, but Dr. Duffy can make you want to change your major. Truly an amazing woman who makes you actually want to go to class and learn. Just interesting readings for homework and in class essay midterm and final with a half page front and back legal cheat sheet. Honor learning from her.

comments: No nonsense, very easy to understand what she wants from students. The field trips in History 368/505 are a lot of fun and you get to see a lot of New York, if you take any other class, you\'ll still have a good experience. Participation makes a huge part of the grade.

comments: Even though this was my first history class I was able to follow along and not be lost during lectures. The reading was enjoyable making the papers that followed fairly easy. The trips were fun and informative. She is a clear grader and lets you know from day 1 what she expects. Highly recommend this class and professor.

comments: Dr. Duffy is a great teacher! Im just finishing my second class with her and I just registered for a third. at times her classes can seem daunting, but she will work with you to pass the class. She is very cheerful and friendly all the time, as long as you don\'t say something against her political beliefs. I would strongly recommend Dr. Duffy.

Avoid her!!!

comments: Dr. Duffy is a great professor. It is obvious she is passionate about what she does. I took her for a methods class for teacher prep. She gives great ideas to future teachers and trully wants to set them on the right path. She is tough, but she has to be for the future teachers.

comments: I loved DR. DUFFY. She is excellent at what she does. You can tell she has a passion for teaching and history. Show up to class and do the work. It isn\'t hard to give her what she wants because she\'s really interested in what the students have to say. How would you have changed history? The exams in class are simple, take notes and pay attention.

comments: She is definately devoted to what she is teaching. she is stict, however if you are having an issue in the class she is more than willing to help. you must do the reading, but you are in college-suck it up. she seems really tough, but she just wants the best from her students. definately will take her again. intreseting class!!

comments: Dr. Duffy totally changed my views of history. Before her class I hated history and had never been truly interested. She makes every class interesting and fun. Attendance is mandatory and she is strict grader but she is totally fair. If you do the work it will pay off but if youre lazy and want an easy A. Don\'t bother taking the class.
